verses.name: Numbers 3:27
verses.text: And of Kohath was the family of the Amramites, and the family of the Izeharites, and the family of the Hebronites, and the family of the Uzzielites: these are the families of the Kohathites.

verses.name: Numbers 3:28
verses.text: In the number of all the males, from a month old and upward, were eight thousand and six hundred, keeping the charge of the sanctuary.

verses.name: Numbers 3:29
verses.text: The families of the sons of Kohath shall pitch on the side of the tabernacle southward.

verses.name: Numbers 3:30
verses.text: And the chief of the house of the father of the families of the Kohathites shall be Elizaphan the son of Uzziel.
